allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add FRC 2020 Infinite Recharge scouting app with Supabase integration

Features:
- Complete match scouting interface with real-time timer
- Toggle buttons for single-use actions (init line, hang, park, level)
- Starting position selection (left/center/right)
- Supabase database integration for cloud storage
- Data dashboard with statistics and filtering
- Export capabilities (JSON/CSV)
- Match details modal view
- Responsive design for tablets and mobile

Technical:
- Vanilla JavaScript (no frameworks)
- Supabase for PostgreSQL database
- Client-side only architecture
- Real-time score calculation
- Action timeline tracking

Documentation:
- QUICK_START.md for setup
- SUPABASE_SETUP.md for database configuration
- DATABASE_OPTIONS.md for comparison of solutions
- PRD.md with full requirements
- README.md with user guide

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
